alert.note: Alert for Barbour (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 3:50PM CST until January 12 at 4:15PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN BARBOUR COUNTY... At 350 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Richards Crossroads, or 11 miles north of Abbeville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Richards Crossroads and Baker Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
